questions.Instruccion: Unscramble the sentences about the party.
Unscramble the sentences adding will to make questions about the future.

questions.question: we / have / the technology to stop asteroid?
questions.answer: Will we have the technology to stop asteroid?

questions.question: scientists / find / dinosaur DNA in their bones?
questions.answer: Will scientists find dinosaur DNA in their bones?

questions.question: When / you / finish / your dinosaur project?
your project / have / a lot of pictures?
questions.answer: Will your project have a lot of pictures?

questions.question: happens / What / you / if / in the sun a lot / are / ?
questions.answer: What happens if you are in the sun a lot?

questions.question: get a rash / he / Does / eats / if / he / seafood?
questions.answer: Does he get a rash if he eats seafood?

questions.question: when / happens / What / arrive / you / late at school?
questions.answer: What happens when you arrive late at school?

questions.question: study / you / Do / if / have / you / next day / a quiz?
questions.answer: Do you study if you have a quiz next day?

questions.question: When you play with a dog, / ears or tail / its / pull / don't
questions.answer: When you play with a dog, don't pull its ears or tail.

questions.question: When you meet a strange cat / try to / you / shouldn't / it / touch
questions.answer: When you meet a strange cat, you shouldn't try to touch it.

questions.question: When you pick up a rabbit, / lift / don't / by it's ears / it
questions.answer: When you pick up a rabbit, don't lift it by it's ears.

questions.question: if a cat is with her kittens / get / you / mustn't / too close
questions.answer: If a cat is with her kittens, you mustn't get too close.
